== Titles of pages in Launchpad ==

=== Status ===

* Created:  by MatthewPaulThomas
* Priority: MediumPriority
* People: SteveAlexanderLead, MatthewPaulThomasSecond
* Status: LaunchpadSpecification, UduBof, ApprovedSpecification
* Dependents:
** UduSessions: 2

=== Summary ===

Context-sensitive and well-constructed `<title>` elements are helpful for referring to pages in browser interfaces and search engines. In Launchpad, titles are implemented in Python code, so that they can be simple, testable, and easily localized.

https://wiki.launchpad.canonical.com/LaunchpadTitles
